other_title: アソボット戦記 五九 (Japanese)
plot: 1000 years in the future, both humans and Asubots were in a bleak of destruction because of a strange phenomenon called the Destruction virus. But a prophecy in the past could save the earth. Goku, a powerfull 1st generation Asubot and Sanzo, a youth from 1000 years met along with their friends to fullfil the prophecy and save the earth from the destruction virus and from Professor D before he destroys the earth.
opening_theme: "BESIDE YOU~Boku wo Yobu Koe~" by BoA (eps 1-25)
ending_theme: "Kasumi Yuku Sora Se ni Shite" by Janne da Arc (eps 14-25)
